issue.title: [CF 971] Not able to detect Hunter's Deterrence Buff
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Subsequently, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type (icon, group, or profile), and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE ABOVE INSTRUCTIONS WILL RESULT IN YOUR TICKET BEING INVALIDATED.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Import my string into latest TellMeWhen.
2. Use Deterrence ability on a hunter.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expected to see TellMeWhen show an icon for the buff.  Instead I saw nothing.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No errors.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^SDefensiveBuffs;~`MiscHelpfulBuffs;~`Deterrence;~`110617;~`148467 ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N2^S[Stacks:Hide(0)] ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N70206^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash | Imported from CurseForge issue #971 | Raw

comments.body:
It works wonderfully for me. All I can think of is that if you are playing on a non-English client then "Deterrence" isn't going to match anything, and those other two spellIDs are not the correct spellIDs for the hunter's deterrence - 19263 is the correct spellID. 110617 is the druid symbiosis deterrence, and I'm not sure what 148467 is.

Edited Jul 18, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Closing ticket, as I am unable to reproduce the issue.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I'm sorry. This was my fault entirely. I had made the Group show only on during combat and had forgotten about it. >_<


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash
